News.headline: Shomari Barnwell On Signing For The Daggers
News.page_title: Shomari Barnwell On Signing For The Daggers
News.URL_keywords: Shomari Barnwell On Signing For The Daggers
News.short_description: Shomari Barnwell on signing for the Daggers and looking back at his debut on Saturday.
News.description:
"It was really good to make my debut, obviously I would have liked to get more minutes and more touches of the ball, but the atmosphere was good and I really enjoyed it apart from the result."

"At the minute I am just taking every day as it comes, I will train hard and hopefully I am able to get my spot in the team."

"It was quite a shock as to hear Dagenham & Redbridge was interested in me but I was really joyful when I heard and it was too good an offer to turn down for me."

"One of the key points that I signed was because of what the manager does with young players by help develop, so that was a main reason that I signed here."

"I would like the chance to show that I can play with this team and contributes with goals and hopefully we can push on for promotion this season."
